Key Match Events: Harry Kane scored the opening goal for England in the 18th minute
Morten Hjulmand equalized for Denmark in the 34th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate was critical of England's performance
England fans booed the team at the end of the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: England remains unbeaten and top of Group C on four points
Others: England struggled in the second half and looked ragged
Denmark made England look disorganized in the second half
England coach Gareth Southgate removed his forward line in a triple substitution with 25 minutes to play
